<description type="note">Preliminaries and introductory material omitted<lb/>The following plays have been taken from this source:</description>

<description type="note">Title: The adoration of the shepherds.
Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.
<description type="note">Square brackets represent sections of text whixh have been deleted or added at different stages in the evolution of the manuscript.</description>

Angelus ad pastores dicit [Gloria in excelsis deo.] Angelus Joye to god Ã¾at sytt in hevyn And pes to man on erthe grownde A chylde is born be-nethe Ã¾e levyn thurwe hym many ffolke xul be vn-bownde Sacramentys Ã¾er xul be vij Wonnyn Ã¾urowe Ã¾at childys wounde Therfore I synge A joyful stevene Ã¾e flowre of frenchep now is founde God Ã¾at wonyght on hy? he is gloryed mannys gost to wynne he hath sent salue to mannys synne Pes is comyn to mannys kynne thorwe goddys sleytys sly?. 1us pastor Maunfras maunfras felawe myne I saw a grett lyght with shene shyne ?it saw I nevyr so selkowth syne Shapyn vpon Ã¾e skyes It is bryghtere Ã¾an Ã¾e sunne bem It comyth ryght ouer all Ã¾is rem Evyn above bedleem I saw it brenne thryes. ijus pastor Thu art my brother boosras I haue beholdyn Ã¾e same pas I trowe it is tokenynge of gras Ã¾at shynynge shewyght be-forn Balaam spak in prophesye A lyght xuld shyne vpon Ã¾e skye Whan A sone of a mayd marye In bedleem were i-born. iijus pastor thow I make lyty noyse I am an herde Ã¾at hattyht moyse I herde carpynge of a croyse of Moyses in his lawe Of a mayd a barne born On a tre he xulde be torn delyver folkes Ã¾at arn forlorn The chylde xulde be slawe. 1us pastor Balaam spak in prophecie out of jacob xuld shyne a skye many ffolke he xulde bye with his bryght blood Be Ã¾at bryght blod Ã¾at he xulde blede he xal us brynge fro Ã¾e develys drede as a duke most dowty in dede thorwe his deth on rode. ijus pastor Amos spak with mylde meth A frute swettere than bawmys breth His deth xulde slen oure sowlys deth And drawe us all from helle Ther fore such lyght goth be-forn In tokyn Ã¾at Ã¾e childe is born Whiche xal saue Ã¾at is for-lorn As prophetys gonne spelle. iijus pastor Danyel Ã¾e prophete Ã¾us gan speke wyse god from woo us wreke Ã¾i bryght hevyn Ã¾ou to-breke and medele Ã¾e with a mayde This prophecye is now spad Cryst in oure kend is clad Ã¾erfore mankend may be glad As prophetys be-forn han seyd. Gloria in excelsis deo cantent. 1us pastor The prophecye of boosdras is spedly sped now leyke we hens as Ã¾at lyght us lede myght we se onys Ã¾at bryght on bed oure bale it wolde vnbynde We xulde shadyr for no shoure buske we us hens to bedleem boure to se Ã¾at fayr fresch flowre the mayde mylde in mynde. ijus pastor Lete us ffolwe with all oure myght With songe and myrth we xul us dyght and wurchep with joye Ã¾at wurthy wyght Ã¾at lord is of mankynne Lete us go fforthe fast on hye And honowre Ã¾at babe wurthylye tunc pastores cantabunt stella celi extirpauit quo facto ibunt ad querendum christum. with merthe songe and melodye haue do Ã¾is songe be-gynne. 1us pastor Ey Ey Ã¾is was a wondyr note Ã¾at was now songyn above Ã¾e sky I haue Ã¾at voys fful wele I wote Ã¾ei songe gle glo glory. ijus pastor. Nay so moty the so was it nowth I haue Ã¾at songe fful wele i-nvm In my wytt weyl it is wrought It was gle glo glas glum. iijus pastor The songe me thought it was glory and aftyr-warde he seyd us to Ã¾er is a chylde born xal be a prynce myghty Ffor to seke Ã¾at chylde I rede we go. 1us pastor Heyle floure of flourys fayrest i-fownde Heyle perle peerles prime rose of prise heyl blome on bedde we xul be vn-bownde with Ã¾i blody woundys and werkys full wyse heyl god grettest I grete Ã¾e on grownde Ã¾e gredy devyl xal grone grysly as a gryse whan Ã¾ou wynnyst Ã¾is worlde with Ã¾i wyde wounde and puttyst man to paradys with plenty of prys to loue Ã¾e is my delyte Heyl floure fayr and fre Lyght from Ã¾e trynyte Heyl blyssyd mote Ã¾ou be heyl mayden fayrest in syght. ijus pastor Heyl floure ovyr fflowrys fowndyn in fryght Heyl Cryst kynde in oure kyth Heyl werker of wele to wonyn us wyth Heyl wynnere i-wys Heyl fformere and ffrende Heyl ffellere of Ã¾e fende Heyl clad in oure kende heyl prince of paradys. iijus pastor Heyl lord ouer lordys Ã¾at lyggyst ful lowe Heyl kynge ovyr kyngys Ã¾i kynrede to knowe Heyl comely knyth Ã¾e deuyl to ouer throwe Heyl flowre of alle Heyl werkere to wynne bodyes bowndyn in synne Heyl in a bestys bynne Be-stad in a stalle. joseph Herdys on hylle beth not stylle but seyth ?our wylle to many A man How god is born Ã¾is mery morn Ã¾at is for-lorn fyndyn he can. 1us pastor We xull telle be dale and hylle How harwere of helle was born Ã¾is nyght myrthis to melle and fendys to quelle Ã¾at were so felle A?ens his ryght. ijus pastor Ffare wel babe and barne of blys Ffare wel lord Ã¾at lovely is Ã¾e to wurchep Ã¾i feet I kys on knes to Ã¾e I falle The to wurchepe I falle on kne all Ã¾is werd may joye of Ã¾e now fare wel lorde of grett pouste ?a fare wel kynge of alle. iijus pastor Thow I be Ã¾e last Ã¾at take my leve ?it fayre mullynge take it nat at no greve now fayre babe wele mut Ã¾ou cheve Ffayr chylde now haue good day Ffare weyl myn owyn dere derlyng I-wys Ã¾ou art a ryght fayr thyng Ffare wel my lorde and my swetyng Ffare wel born in pore Aray. Maria Now ?e herd-men wel mote ?e be Ffor ?oure omage and ?our syngynge my sone xal a-qwyte ?ow in hefne se and ?eue ?ow all ryght good hendynge.
